channel.title: Karate at Home Guide on Kamaete: Karate at Home
channel.description: Recent content in Karate at Home Guide on Kamaete: Karate at Home

item.title: Black/brown belt
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Tobikomizuki/Nagashizuki/Gyakuzuki Basic 3: Otoshi barai & stand up technique Basic 4: Mawashi uraken

item.title: Brown/black belt
item.description: Basics Basic 5: Tobi sokuto (Jumping sidekick) Basic 6: Tatsumaki geri (Tornado kick)

item.title: Purple belt
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Ushiro mawashi geri (spinning hook kick) Solo combinations Solo Combination 1: Mae geri/Mawashi geri/Sokuto/Ushiro geri/Gyakuzuku Solo Combination 2: Mae geri/Tobikomizuki/Ashi barai/Tobikomizuki/Haito Solo Combination 3: Yoko geri/Mawashi geri/Mawashi uraken/Gyakazuki

item.title: Blue belt
item.description: Basics Basic 5: Nagashizuki Basic 6: Kakato geri Solo combinations Solo Combination 1: Mae geri/Gyakuzuki/Zenshin Shiite/Joden uke/Gyakuzuki Solo Combination 2: Mae geri/Yoko geri/Mawashi geri/Gyakuzuki Solo Combination 3: Mae geri/Mawashi geri/Sokuto/Ushiro geri/Gyakuzuki Pairs Pair 1: Attacker left/Defender right Pair 2: Drop sweep (Otoshi barai)

item.title: Green belt
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Kick/Punch (Kette junzuki) Basic 2: Front kick/Opposite punch (Kette gyakuzuki) Basic 3: Tobikomizuki from shizentai Basic 4: Sokuto Chudan Basic 5: Mawashi geri nikai Basic 6: Nidan geri Pairs Pair 1: Overview (Mawashi geri/Tobikomizuki/Gyakuzuki/Ashi Barai/Kizamizuki) Pair 1: Defence (Body shield/Chop block) Pair 2: Attack (I forgot to defend my head on the stunning elbow strike) Pair 2: Defence (Nagash-uke/Empi/Mawashi empi/Ashi barai/Tobikomizuki) Pair 2: Defence (Nagash-uke/Empi/Mawashi empi/Ashi barai/Tobikomizuki) Solo combinations Solo Combination 1: Tobikomizuki/Gyakuzuki/Ashi Barai/Gyakuzuki Solo Combination 2: Yoko geri/Mawashi geri/Gyakuzuki Solo Combination 3: Mawashi geri/Ushiro geri/uraken

item.title: Orange belt
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Junzuki no tsukkomi (leaning front punch) Basic 2: Gyakuzuki no tsukkomi (leaning opposite punch) Basic 3: Roundhouse kick (Mawashi geri - Chudan) Basic 4: Roundhouse kick (Mawashi geri) Basic 5: Back kick (Ushiro geri) Solo combinations Solo Combination 1: Mae geri/Mawashi geri/Gyakuzuki Solo Combination 2: Mae geri/Tobikomizuki/Zenshin koutai/Tobikomizuki/Mawashi geri Solo Combination 3: Back fist/chop (uraken/Shuto gamen) Pairs Pair 1 Pair 2

item.title: Yellow/orange belt
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Kette junzuki (Front kick and front punch) Basic 2: Kette gyakuzuki (Front kick and opposite punch) Basic 3: Roundhouse kick (Mawashi geri) Basic 4: Step up sidekick (surikomi sokuto) Pairs Inner block/Backfist/Gyakuzuki Solo combinations Solo Combination 1: Sidekick to the side/Front kick/Opposite punch (Yoko sokuto/Mae geri/Gyakuzuki) Solo Combination 2: Roundhouse kick/Opposite punch (Mawashi geri/Gyakuzuki) Solo Combination 3: Side kick/Back fist (Sokuto/Uraken)

item.title: Yellow belt
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Step and punch in zenkutsudachi Basic 2: Gyakuzuki from zenkutsudachi Basic 3: Front kick (Mae geri) Basic 4: Step up side kick (surikomi sokuto) Solo combinations Solo Combination 1: Elbow and back fist (Empi uraken) Solo Combination 2: Front kick/Opposite punch (Mae geri/Gyakuzuki) Solo Combination 3: Front kick/Jab punch (Mae geri/Tobikomizuki)

item.title: Red/black belt
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Step punch (Junzuki) in Zenkutsudachi Basic 2: Elbow strike (Empi) Basic 3: Step up front kick (Surikomi mae geri) Basic 4: Step up roundhouse kick (Surikomi mawashi geri)

item.title: Red belt
item.description: Stances Attention stance/Musubudachi Ready stance/Yo-oi Blocking Head block/low block/inner block Movement Step/shuffle/switch/turn

item.title: Forest Dojo
item.description: This is not a drill: Who are you anyway? Make yourself proud A little bit of something... New habits

item.title: Kata tutorial and demonstration
item.description: Tutorial Kata support: half-turned cat stance Demonstration Pinan Nidan Pinan Sandan Pinan Shodan Pinan Yodan Pinan Godan Naifanchi Kushanku

item.title: Kicks tutorial
item.description: Mae Geri/Front Kick Spinning Hook Kick Side kick (Yoko Geri) Exercise Improve your balance for kicking

item.title: Weapons tutorial
item.description: Nunchaku Elite Figure 8 Nunchaku Advanced Tutorial Bo Toma Bo Tokumine no kun

item.title: Exercises, challenges and badges
item.description: Exercises Daily stretch Karate home training exercises Challenges Sensei Billy's kata/chores Planking with Sensei Joe Sensei Billy's Plank Challenge Badges Skipping Challenge Blocking Challenge Skipping badge 1 Skipping badge 2
